# Change Log

## [1.2.0] - 2020-07-21
### Added
- Support for Php 7.4
- Support for Magento 2.4

## [1.1.1] - 2020-07-10
### Added
- Compatibility with PdfCore 19

## [1.1.0] - 2020-04-01
### Added
- Moved icon file content into separate files

## [1.0.2] - 2020-01-08
### Fixed
- Table padding on alternative design

## [1.0.1] - 2019-09-23
### Added
- Initial Release
